name: explosion of bubbles
description:
i recommend to play main_Game in hard and mouse_point_killer it's simple game and easy it's first time to use timeline in unity How to play: bullet follow your mouse cursor and explosion the bubble there was 2 types of levels: Main_Game - mouse_Pointer_Killer:
